properties.desc: Osborne 1986 "On the east slope of Cape Pakhys 'an ancient fort'. Baker-Penoyre 229.

Osborne 1986 "The cape is heavily overgrown. There are pines directly to the east but olives on the coastal plain to the south. Clear view to Cape Pakhys to the north and along the coast south. Tower not found and dimensions unknown. BCH 85 (1961) 940
Osborne 1986 "On the point immediately south of a quarry where the rock has been cut down to sea-level, a tower 3-5 m in diameter

Osborne 1986 "On the south side of the bay a tower 10.2 x 9.9 m with associated stairway and terracing.
The tower stands to some 2 m on the lower side, with a foundation levelling course and parpens above.

Osborne 1986 "On the cape a tower 5.2 m in diameter preserved to a metre high. From this tower comes the inscription in late Archaic lettering suggesting that it served some sort of warning function for sailors...

Osborne 1986 "About 2 km south of Potamia, a tower 9.62 x 9.62 m of well-dressed ashlar blocks. Now very heavily overgrown with brushwood but excavated by Bon who found evidence for a late fourth- or
early third-century date...

Osborne 1986 "Some 50 m from the tip of the cape a tower 10.3 x 6.3 m, of which only the foundations are preserved, in a court. There is a light scatter of sherds both in the area of the tower and higher up the
point...  Autopsy.Bon I6o-I.

Osborne 1986 "South of Kinyra, at the rear of the plain between two ravines a tower 7 x 7 m. The tower
appears not to be visible today, and may possibly be concealed by the modern road...
Osborne 1986 "On hill at south end of Kinyra bay a circular basis some i o m in diameter. Apparently on a slope now covered in pines and much cut about by modern tracks. Baker-Penoyre 234, Bon 162.

Osborne 1986 "On the east side of the bay further back from the sea than the square tower to the west a round defence work about I o m in diameter. For the general situation, see no. i. Baker-Penoyre
235, Bon 163.

Osborne 1986 "A tower of 10x10 m lies on the west side of the bay at the very edge of the cliff. Only the lowest course remains. There is a commanding view over the bay but no
further...
Osborne 1986 "Yvon Garlan tells me that there is a quadrangular tower on this cape."

Osborne 1986 "In the middle of traces of quarrying, I km west of Aliki, a tower 9 x 9 m. This is the site of a Byzantine village. The tower is substantially built and survives to a height of almost 2 m..."
Osborne 1986 "On the spur projecting from the hill range to the west a tower of c.20 m diameter standing to more than 3 m high..."

Osborne 1986 "On the point east of Vathy Potamia bay and immediately west of Moni Arkhangelou a tower 7.6 m in diameter preserved to three courses of well-shaped stones with some further fallen stones...

Osborne 1986 "At west end of ridge of hills due east of Astris a marble tower 7.5 x 8.0 m preserved to some 2 m high. The tower not only has a spectacular view over the whole south-west tip of the island..."

Osborne 1986 "In the middle of the bay just behind the beach a tower of which one side is revealed in
the bank of the track leading down to the sea...
Osborne 1986 "In the village forming the foundations for a house, a tower 9.9 x i 1.6 m. The tower is on rising ground but not at the top of the slope..."
Osborne 1986 "On the steep slope on the north side of a dry valley which leads a crooked way down to the valley in which Avatsinia lies, a tower 8 x 8 m..."

Osborne 1986 "North of the cape, on hill south of Astris bay, a tower 9 x 14 m of local ironstone. If
correctly identified this tower lies close to the modern triangulation point and only one or two blocks mark..."

Osborne 1986 "In valley north of Astris running down to the north of the bay of Astris, and about
2 km from the sea, a tower 8 x 8 m in a court 30 x 23 m ..."

Osborne 1986 "Kaminorokhaïko: In valley leading north-east from Psili Ammos, on hill to south of valley a tower
7.5 x 5 m at the corner of an enclosure 26 x 13 m..."

properties.Name: Ποτός
properties.desc:
Osborne 1986 "Some distance from the sea at the foot of a hill at the south-west of the plain a tower
16.3 x 17.8 m. Conze 34."

properties.Name: Ποτός
properties.desc: Osborne 1986 "North of the road to Theologo a tower 8.8 x 9.9 m. Conze 35."
Tour carrée située à proximité des installations Speidel selon la carte d'Osborne. Osborne 1986 "Above the beach a tower 9 x 9 m. Conze 38, AM 33 (1908) 240."

Osborne 1986 "In the broad valley south of Skala Maries, on an eminence claimed to dominate the whole
area south to Cape Kephalas, a tower 9.4 x 9.4 m amid abandoned terracing and a heavy scatter of sherds..."

Osborne 1986 "In valley south of Skala Maries a tower 9 m in diameter. Conze 38. See general remarks for
no. 17"
Osborne 1986 "Half an hour before arriving at the village a tower 13.5 x 10.75 m on the west slope of a gentle hill. Long thin blocks with larger blocks above... Bon 165-7 with plan"

Osborne 1986 "on road from Skala Maries to Maries. A gneiss tower 10 x 10 m, of which only two corners and the lowest course of one side are now visible, lies on a slight natural eminence on the north bank of the stream..." ; Bon 1930, p. 171.
Osborne 1986 "Tsouknidha In the valley leading up from Prinos to Kasaviti, just to the south of the modern road about 2 km before Mikro Kasaviti a gneiss tower 8.0 x 8.8 m..." ; Bon 1930, p. 174.

Village médiéval avec tour carrée. Osborne 1986 "Ovraio: A deserted medieval village on the path from Kasaviti to Rakhoni (now no longer in use) includes a tower 9.4 x 9.4 m of large blocks in irregular courses. This is now in pine forest. Bon 175-7."
Garlan BCH 128-129 (2004-2005), p. 269-329. "... à proximité imédiate d'une "tour" en bel appareil, un petit dépotoir composé essentiellement d'amphores et de tuiles (avec des surcuits)."
Dépotoir d'atelier fouillé en 1995. Voir Garlan BCH 128-129 (2004-2005), p. 269-329.

properties.Name: Αερμόλα
properties.desc: Habitat avec tour et atelier présumé Garlan BCH 128-129 (2004-2005), p. 269-329.
Dépotoir d'atelier sur 30m mais sans timbre "sans doute antérieur à la pratique du timbrage". Garlan BCH 128-129 (2004-2005), p. 269-329.

A 500 m environ à l'Ouest d'Haghios Tryphonas, au Sud de la route qui va de Kéramidi à Skala Mariés, s'étale d'autre part une grande nappe de céramique d'apparence assez tardive (hell rom)...  Garlan BCH 128-129 (2004-2005), p. 312.
Atelier amphorique à la production importante. Garlan BCH 128-129 (2004-2005), p. 312-313.
Atelier fouillé en 1984. Garlan 1986, p. 225-229 ; Garlan BCH 128-129 (2004-2005), p. 311.
Atelier fouillé en 1985. Garlan 1993, p. 157-170 ; Garlan BCH 128-129 (2004-2005), p. 311.
Large installation sur la colline fouillé en 1978. Garlan 1979 ; Garlan BCH 128-129 (2004-2005), p. 269-329.
Atelier fouillé en 1979 et 1980. Garlan BCH 128-129 (2004-2005), p. 310.
Habitat isolé das les hauteus fonctionnant entre le IVe et Ier siècle avant notre ère. A fait l'objet de fouilles en 2013 https://chronique.efa.gr/?kroute=report&id=4082
Plusieurs structures rectangulaires affleurent et attestent de la présence probable d'un habitat.
Atelier archaïque.
